definition: to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over

sentences.english: According to the point-set topology theory, regions with holes are redefined.
sentences.chinese: 根据点集拓扑学理论，对带孔面域进行了定义。

sentences.english: The method of mappings and covers is a basic tool to study general topology.
sentences.chinese: 映射与覆盖的方法是研究一般拓扑学的基本工具。

sentences.english: At is time the subject of topology was known as analysis situs .
sentences.chinese: 在这个时候，拓扑学被称做位置几何学。

sentences.english: See, this is kind of topology in a way.
Intopological graph theory, the surface S is a compact 2-dimensional manifold without boundary.
sentences.chinese: 曲面S是拓扑学中的无边缘的2维紧闭流型。

sentences.english: Monadic Boolean algebras have an important connection to topology.
sentences.chinese: 一元布尔代数与拓扑学有重要联系。

sentences.english: Students should have some familiarity with commutative algebra and basic topology.
sentences.chinese: 学生需要对交换代数和基本拓扑学有一定的了解。

sentences.english: Methods Using method of the theory of set and general topology.
sentences.chinese: 方法集合论与点集拓扑学中的方法。

sentences.english: The students in a topology course should have some knowledge of mathematical analysis and abstract algebra .
sentences.chinese: 拓扑学要求学生具备一些数学分析和抽象代数的基础。

sentences.english: The theory of generalized metric spaces is an important question of general topology.
sentences.chinese: 广义度量空间理论是一般拓扑学研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: Separation axiom is one of the important studied content in topology.
sentences.chinese: 分离性是拓扑学中重要研究课题之一。

sentences.english: Topology is an one-semester course at the senior level.
sentences.chinese: 拓扑学应为大学四年级一学期的课程。
